scripts.generate:security-apis: export TS_POST_PROCESS_FILE='yarn prettier --write'; npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Telecominfraproject/wlan-cloud-ucentralsec/main/openpapi/ucentralsec/owsec.yaml -g typescript-axios -o ./src/api/generated/owSecurityApi --ignore-file-override=.openapi-generator-ignore --enable-post-process-file
scripts.generate:userportal-apis: export TS_POST_PROCESS_FILE='yarn prettier --write'; npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./src/api/open-api/userportal.yaml -g typescript-axios -o ./src/api/generated/owUserPortalApi --ignore-file-override=.openapi-generator-ignore --enable-post-process-file
scripts.generate:gateway-apis: export TS_POST_PROCESS_FILE='yarn prettier --write'; npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Telecominfraproject/wlan-cloud-ucentralgw/master/openapi/ucentral/owgw.yaml -g typescript-axios -o ./src/api/generated/owGatewayApi --ignore-file-override=.openapi-generator-ignore --enable-post-process-file
scripts.generate:provisioning-apis: export TS_POST_PROCESS_FILE='yarn prettier --write'; npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Telecominfraproject/wlan-cloud-owprov/main/openapi/owprov.yaml -g typescript-axios -o ./src/api/generated/owProvisioningApi --ignore-file-override=.openapi-generator-ignore --enable-post-process-file
